name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Unity Engineer with a proven background in optimizing mobile performance, I bring expertise in **C#**, **ECS**, **DOTS**, and multithreaded programming. I have successfully implemented advanced **profiling tools**, **CPU/GPU profiling**, and memory management strategies to ensure high-performance applications. My skill set includes optimizing rendering pipelines and utilizing the **Burst Compiler** and **Job System** to enhance application efficiency. I excel in managing asset streaming, developing modular architectures, and establishing effective telemetry systems and diagnostic frameworks. 

With 8 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer in the healthcare and financial sectors, I've led the development of enterprise-grade platforms using modern technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My deep understanding of cloud environments, specifically **Azure** and **AWS**, and my knowledge of compliance standards, allow me to build robust solutions that align with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. I also bring hands-on experience in AI/ML capabilities, developing machine learning pipelines, and implementing MLOps workflows with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
